[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]RuneCrafting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- All runes - Talisman[/COLOR] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Classic-Live #289 look-alike
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

Our latest update has been pushed to the live gameserver, start slaying dem dragons!!!

[QUOTE author=Scully]Hey guys,

I’m posting this week’s update a bit early, but we really need to get this kind of key content into the game. I’ve done an expansion to the Dragon’s Lair which adds blue, and red dragons. Finally allowing you to get Blue and Red dragon hides. If you’re wondering about black dragon hides, well the King Black Dragon finally drops those.

Location of the new expansion

kuGLcSA.png765×498

The Second Chamber

yobrXqz.png765×505

Super Spooky Blue Dragons

AkhFEwg.png764×501

Red Dragons

hIjee4d.png764×502

I wonder what else lies beyond this door

x0l4AUZ.png766×498

In other news,

You can now obtain red spider eggs and blue dragon scales as drops from Red Spiders and Blue Dragons respectively.

Rune platelegs, and kiteshields have been removed from Undead Ones.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy,

Brian[/QUOTE]

Read full topic

item.title: Classic-Live #289 look-alike
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Hey Everyone,

I’ve stayed up all night adding this update in. There was a lot more too it than I had originally anticipated, but here it is! The Magic Update. The thing that will hopefully bring magic into the game as a viable form of combat.

Mage Arena:

To get to the Mage Arena a lever has been added at home

qAcclCr.png764×500

Once there you will see the usual cast of characters. These NPCs offer better rune sales, a reward points shop, a bank, and a small gloss over the information about the Mage Arena.

5lJoGqm.png763×498

You can enter the arena by going through the sparkling pool.

wE1ZYWn.png768×500

Once there you will find a decent amount of monsters. They are aggressive and can only be harmed by magic attacks. Did I mention they can also hit through prayer by causing half of the hit they normally would.

DxH6vHX.png761×497

Each kill will grant you points which you can then spend with the Chamber Guardian.

s1eVxoj.png760×498

To leave the arena and return to the Safe room you can either teleport out or go to these magic portals.

U9w0VNR.png762×495

In other news,

I have made it so that enchanting jewelry now works with Staves.

Zaff in Edgeville now has a slightly increased stock.

Thanks,

Brian

Read full topic

Could be due to his java and maybe removing his cache could work
